sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
plainly the case
, je dobro vidno, da je tako, kot je.

Kadar človek kaj vidi, sliši ali vonja
plainly
, tisto vidi, sliši ali vonja brez težav.

seg.quote: You could see the oysters quite plainly, lying all over the sea-bed.

sense.def:
Kadar človek kaj reče
plainly
, so njegove besede lahko razumljive, tako da ne more biti nesporazuma.

seg.quote: The judge said that quite plainly.
